achievements.title: Better Alarm UI – Redesigned Digital Alarm Clock
achievements.description: Complete redesign of a traditional alarm-clock interface that reduced user steps from 4–7 clicks down to just 1 click while adding real-time feedback, browser notifications, and an emergency clear button.
impact: Reduced cognitive load and interaction cost by over 75%
Implemented Web Notifications API with permission handling
Added visible status banner and audio feedback
Fully responsive design with dark-mode aesthetic
keyFeatures: One-click alarm setting using native <input type="time">
Live digital clock with second precision
Audio alarm + browser push notification on trigger
Before & After comparison pages documenting UX improvements

projects.name: Better Alarm UI
projects.shortDescription: Minimal, high-conversion alarm clock with one-click setting
